caption: A man peeks out from behind a wooden door. He walks along a country road and arrives in a bustling city with vibrant nightlife. He picks up a phone and sits in a car. A woman is waiting on the roadside, and later, the woman collapses in a pool of blood. Inside a police station, a police officer in a blue uniform sits across from three officers in white uniforms. In another scene, a person in a black suit is flipping through some documents. By the seaside, two men walk along the beach. They chat occasionally, and one of the men touches his chest.
